title: Need a real option for AP waveclear item, or buff luden's against minions.

replies.body:
buff ludens against minions. seriously. the item is never bought for its waveclear. it chunks 1/4s of minions health. and has high cd. the item is more exclusively bought for burst and movement speed.


make it charge faster and make it do 100% more damage to minions.

i dont think viktor or anivia would abuse it they can one shot waves already. can't do better than that.
